/usr/bin/c++  -lpqxx -lpq -g   CMakeFiles/echo_server.dir/echo_server.cpp.o  -o echo_server  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so.1.71.0 -lpthread
